summary: Root cause identified: page cache stores pre-formatted display lines with stale pagination header. When render_cached_page() displays cached content, it shows the old page counter from when the page was preloaded, not the current page.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting cache-related pagination display bug with three fix options

next_steps: Run /plan 79 to create implementation plan based on Fix Option 1 (regenerate header on cache hit)
